name: Umbral Shambler
movement: walks 20 feet, doubles speed in dim light or darkness
description: The Umbral Shambler is a shadowy creature with a muscular build and a dark, flowing form that embodies darkness and despair.
memorable: It can maneuver through shadows and attack with both slashing and necrotic damage, making it a threat in low-light situations.
goals: To confuse and ambush its prey from the shadows.
relations: May be accompanied by other shadowy creatures or dark minions.
environment: Typically found in dimly lit areas or shadowy environments.
strengths: Excellently adapted to low-light environments, allows for stealthy movement and ambush tactics.
weaknesses: Struggles in bright sunlight, suffers disadvantage on attacks and perception checks in such conditions.
attacks: Can make two claw strikes dealing slashing and necrotic damage, powerful in darkness due to its mobility.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to project itself beyond typical reality, moving through solid objects in dim light.
senses: Has blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without sight.
skills: Proficient in perception, making it perceptive to hidden threats.
additional_information: Resistant to necrotic and psychic damage.
Immune to being charmed and exhausted.
Enhances movement in dim lighting conditions.
Clever use of the environment to ambush foes.
test_queries: shadowy creature that can move through walls
aberration that excels in darkness and stealth
medium monster vulnerable to radiant attacks
cunning creature that attacks in low-light
creature with claw attacks and necrotic damage
